channel.title: How do i become an admin on my server?
channel.description: uh yeah how do i... i'm lost and my server ip is 0.0.0.0 is this a public server? where other people can use it that is?

item.title: How do i become an admin on my server?
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

oh when u log in and u dont want to play no more type ::save and it will save your character. and it says when it start DONT ASK TO BE A MOD! BECAUSE IT DOESNT WORK.

get a better source and is not from testscape

item.title: How do i become an admin on my server?
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

you go into the character folder and click ur character and change the character-rights to 3.
and ur an admin in ur server. but if u using a testscape source then change the rights to 2.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i become an admin on my server?

item.title: How do i become an admin on my server?
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

You know how you go to the server file? well you go there. Then you go to Characters(Make sure you are logged out…) Then look for your name, then look for something like this character-rights = 0 then replace the 0 with a 2, then go to file, and SAVE IT. close it then log in, ta da.

Read full topic
